ess-beta-metadata.label: 4G coverage
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of area with 4G coverage from at least one mobile network provider
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), in the UK, as of July 2025.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
